name: Newspapers, Please!
description:
The life of a newsboy can be very complicated if the whole city must march on command of the dictator. Level design could be changed till the end of the jam.

Game made by

Stas Shostak (Game design, programming) - https://twitter.com/StasShostak

Alex (art, modelling) - https://twitter.com/AleksandrPalmov

Ira Lobanok (music) - https://twitter.com/IraLobanok
